item.title: Sue Wallace
item.description: I’m a Senior Statistician with 5 years of experience working as an analyst in the charity and public sector. I’m a keen data scientist and sociologist, so this blog is kind of about that. I’m mostly using R.

item.title: Fatal Force with Cross Talk
item.description: Using crosstalk and html widgets such as flexdashboard, leaflet and DT to create an interactive application
